long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You snooze, you lose!

Snoozer is an AI face-tracking productivity app that jumpscares you awake when it catches you dozing off in front of your computer. It's a cheeky critique of digital surveillance technology and hustle culture, and a fun prank for yourself or friends.
